duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and mentor staff to deliver complex capital projects.
Coordinate project activities through project close-out.
Monitor project performance, identify project issues and risks, and ensure timely resolution and mitigation.
Coordinate project activities with project team, staff, consultants, and other stakeholders.
Manage project documentation to ensure quality, completeness, and accuracy.
Manage progress against project scope, schedule, and budget.
Review and approve contract invoices and other project charges.
Manage comprehensive project document control and retention.
Manage the preparation of reports, presentations, and studies.
Lead staff selection, coaching, training, development, evaluation, and discipline/termination.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, Architecture, Construction or Project Management, Business Administration, Transportation, or a related field.
PMP and CCM Certifications are preferred.
